column1: Funeral Services will be held at 10:00 a.m. on Saturday
column3: 2015 at the Kindred Funeral Home (400 Union Blvd.
column4: Englewood) with Rev. Dr. Steve Gill and Chaplain David Snowdon officiating. Interment will be at Concord Church Cemetery in Englewood. The family will receive friends on Friday from 5:00 to 7:00 p.m. at the funeral home.
